title: Transworld - First Love
description: Transworld Video #17. Crafted by Jon Holland and Jason Hernandez, First Love showcased stuntwood romantics from veteran to rookie status. Shiloh Greathouse’s first part in years is filled with OG fun and new school NBDs. Richard Angelides follows with a part of pure surgical accuracy. Omar Salazar scrapes and skids his way into history with high-speed uniqueness (and a mind-blowing taildrop at the Encinitas train station).
